item.title: Nigeria's Banking Sector: CBN's Recapitalisation Drive and Its Far-Reaching Implications
item.description:
This episode delves into the Central Bank of Nigeria's ongoing bank recapitalisation exercise, analyzing how 27 banks are raising fresh capital to meet new thresholds. We explore the facts behind this critical policy, the controversies surrounding its implementation, and its profound impact on Nigeria's economy and society, from financial stability to everyday citizens.
Hosts: Host: Peter Johnson, Co-Host: Sister Nkechi
Category: Economy
